thread.title: EastEnders' Dot Cotton actress June Brown was really hot when she was younger - and here's the proof
thread.title_full: EastEnders' Dot Cotton actress June Brown was really hot when she was younger - and here's the proof

author: Jennifer Crothers
title: EastEnders' Dot Cotton actress June Brown was really hot when she was younger - and here's the proof
text:
June Brown was a bit of a looker in her youth Share   Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Soap queen June Brown was a complete hottie when she was younger - and we've got the pictures to prove it. 
The beloved EastEnders star, who's been in the soap since 1985, was stunning. And doesn't she know it. 
"Well, I hope you’ll forgive me if I confirm that yes, I was very beautiful," the absolute legend told the Daily Mail back in 2013. "Certainly, between the ages of 18 and 23 when I married for the first time, I seemed to attract the opposite sex." June Brown, back in the day (Photo: Rex Features) June Brown as Dot Cotton in EastEnders (Photo: Mirrorpix) 
June, who turns 90 next month, also admitted she was quite into racy relations in her youth. 
"Don't get me wrong. I wasn't a nymphomaniac," she wrote in her 2013 autobiography Before The Year Dot. "But I was sexually active although I kept quiet about it. You did back then. The war changed everything of course. 
"I was 12 when it broke out. I joined the Wrens at 18 and that gave me a tremendous sense of liberation. As you couldn't be sure what tomorrow might bring, you felt like making the most of today. 
"If I'd stayed at home I'd have married as a virgin." June Brown as herself, in 2012 at the Mirror's Pride of Britain awards (Photo: Phil Harris) The BBC are celebrating June's 32 years in the popular soap 
June's long-running turn as busybody Dot in the soap is to be celebrated in a one off half hour EastEnders special. 
And her role as one of the best-loved stars of the soap doesn't look like it's going to end any time soon. 
A source told The Mirror: “They realise June isn’t getting any younger but she has intimated that she wants to carry on in the role as long as she feels able, so that is great news.” Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
